text:
The ultimate indulgent staycation at The Landmark Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong Published on : Tuesday, August 18, 2015
Guests can treat themselves and loved ones to the new Ultimate Indulgent Staycation room package at The Landmark Mandarin Oriental. Carefully designed with guests’ needs in mind, the package includes spa, dining, limousine and in-room indulgencies.
Whether it’s to reward themselves after a busy week or to say thank you to that special someone, package guests can experience rejuvenating Sanctuary Suite treatments for couples, and other signature facilities, including Turkish hammam and ice fountains, at The Oriental Spa. Sauna, steam room and indoor swimming pool are among other revitalising spa amenities available.
Package guests can enjoy quality time savouring fine champagne in the comfort of their room, indulge in exceptional cuisine at the two-Michelin-star Amber restaurant and enjoy the hotel’s famous afternoon tea or new Aperitivo at MO Bar. Complimentary round trip limousine transfers ensure guests experience hassle-free arrivals and departures, with no need to worry about heat and humidity, carrying their own shopping bags and catching a flight.
The Ultimate Indulgent Staycation package includes:
Daily buffet breakfast at MO Bar or set breakfast at Amber for up to two persons
Complimentary Internet access Welcome Champagne and Canapes Selection of Afternoon tea for two persons or Aperitivo for two persons at MO Bar A three-course set lunch at Amber for up to two persons A 60-minute Oriental Essence Massage for two persons in Sanctuary Suite Round trip hotel limousine
